title: Bug 36000[StyledText] ContentWidthCache initialization
description: Bug 36000[StyledText] ContentWidthCache initialization build R2.1bug 35943 documents a problem where apparently the font/line height is 0.
OB: Thiscauses improper initialization of StyledText, namely of the ContentWidthCacheduring setContent/reset/calculateContentWidth.In a normal operating scenario the lineHeight should never be 0.
EB: It isinitialized in the StyledText constructor via initializeRenderer.We may want to remove the lineHeight check in calculateContentWidth and alwaysinitialize the line cache.In addition we should consider adding a range check inContentWidthCache.calculate like it already is in ContentWidthCache.reset.
